          <title>

            <string language="x-mt-de">große Freskoschleifen des Endes des 
Jahrhunderts</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">grands cycles de fresque de la fin du siècle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ciclos grandes do fresco do fim do século</string>

            <string language="x-mt-es">grandes ciclos del fresco del final del siglo</string>

          <description>
            <string language="hu">Az umbriai iskola festőinek alkotásainak bemutatása</string>
            <string language="en">presentation of works of arts from the Umbria school</string>

          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">quattrocento,  freskóciklus,  Firenze,  Orvieto,  Lippi, Filippino,  Signorelli, Luca,  </string>

Schule</string>

          <description>
